name: BandScore
short_description:
BandScore want to be the simplest, fastest and easy-to-use editor and player for all commons musical instruments.

The major axis for this project are :

- A score editor that provide the same quality of a professionnal editor. 

- A score player that include a customizable sampler that support all the common soundbanks formats : SF2 (SoundFont), GIG (Gigasampler), DLS (DownloadbleSound) and more ... And able to connect all the major technologies of the audio world like virtual instruments, or digital audio processing (dsp/vst ...).

Maybe, if some people are insteresting by this project, it will be very cool to work on some realistic virtual singer, a good quality vocal synthesizer specialized to produce a good lyrics audio rendering.
